2315.name: Crest Nature's Expressions Toothpaste
2315.description: New Crest? Nature?s Expressions? toothpaste combines Crest?s trusted formula with natural flavor ingredients for a refreshing brushing experience. Balancing health and beauty benefits, Crest Nature?s Expressions fights cavities and tartar buildup, removes plaque, helps freshen breath and polishes away surface stains to whiten teeth. Plus, each flavor is created using natural extracts.
